page.title: 06Industries-Leeswood area
page.content: In our area there are various types of industry.There are two in Leeswood, one in Coed-Talon and one in Ponty- bodkin. "Laura Ashley",one of the sites of industry in Leeswood makes clothes. The other factory in Leeswood which makes spectacles is called Fast Optical Services.They make approx. 250 000 pairs per year. The Iron Works in Pontybodkin used to make metal but now is used to store pipes.Clwyd Alloys Ltd. which is based in Coed-Talon was a metal works.Like the Iron Works it is now used to store goods made outside the area. A great number of industrial sites have disappeared since the 1930s.There were collieries,ironworks and sites for the extraction and processing of oil shale.
